title: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos
text:
Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Bianca Andreescu, left, consoles Serena Williams after Williams' back spasms forced her to retire from the Rogers Cup final in Toronto on Sunday, August 11. Hide Caption 1 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Simone Biles performs her floor routine during the US Gymnastics Championships on Sunday, August 11. Biles made history during the routine by becoming the first woman to land a triple-double in competition. She also won her sixth national all-around title. Hide Caption 2 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Benfica soccer players celebrate after winning Portugal's Super Cup on Sunday, August 4. Hide Caption 3 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos From left, Venezuela's Yulimar Rojas, Cuba's Liadagmis Povea and Jamaica's Shanieka Ricketts celebrate at the Pan American Games on Friday, August 9. Rojas won gold in the triple jump. Ricketts won silver and Povea won bronze. Hide Caption 4 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Mike Perry's nose was disfigured during his UFC fight against Vicente Luque on Saturday, August 10. Luque won the bout by split decision. Hide Caption 5 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone holds Brett Gardner from going after umpire Chris Segal during a Major League Baseball game in Toronto on Friday, August 9. Gardner was angry because Segal had thrown him out of the game. Hide Caption 6 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Baltimore's Kenny Young sacks Jacksonville's Gardner Minshew during an NFL preseason game on Thursday, August 8. Hide Caption 7 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Antigua's Priscilla Frederick competes in the high jump at the Pan American Games on Thursday, August 8. Hide Caption 8 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Fans of Greek soccer club PAOK chant slogans during a Champions League qualifier in Thessaloniki, Greece, on Tuesday, August 6. Hide Caption 9 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos American swimmer Margo Geer competes at the Pan American Games on Thursday, August 8. She won gold in the 100-meter freestyle. Hide Caption 10 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Cincinnati's Clayton Fejedelem tackles Kansas City's Tremon Smith during an NFL preseason game on Saturday, August 10. Hide Caption 11 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Las Vegas' Dearica Hamby shoots the ball during a WNBA game against Washington on Monday, August 5. Hide Caption 12 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Horses race in Louth, Australia, on Saturday, August 10. Hide Caption 13 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Pitcher Fernando Cruz celebrates after Puerto Rico defeated Canada in the gold-medal game of the Pan American Games on Sunday, August 4. Hide Caption 14 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Juventus' Cristiano Ronaldo heads the ball over Atletico Madrid's Kieran Trippier during a preseason match in Solna, Sweden, on Saturday, August 10. Hide Caption 15 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Bodybuilders flex at the Pan American Games on Saturday, August 10. Hide Caption 16 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos US wrestler Whitney Conder runs with an American flag after winning gold in her weight class at the Pan American Games on Thursday, August 8. Hide Caption 17 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos A video screen shows archery Saturday, August 10, during the Pan American Games in Lima, Peru. Hide Caption 18 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos New York Jets cornerback Parry Nickerson tries to corral New York Giants wide receiver Russell Shepard during an NFL preseason game on Thursday, August 8. Shepard scored a touchdown on the play. Hide Caption 19 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos BMX racers compete at the Pan American Games on Friday, August 9. Hide Caption 20 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos US fencer Anne-Elizabeth Stone celebrates after winning gold in the sabre at the Pan American Games on Tuesday, August 6. Hide Caption 21 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Argentina's Maria Vargas dives for a ball hit by Mexico's Paola Longoria during a racquetball match at the Pan American Games on Wednesday, August 7. Longoria won the match and the gold medal. Hide Caption 22 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Brenda Castillo, a volleyball player for the Dominican Republic, competes in the gold-medal match at the Pan American Games on Sunday, August 11. The Dominicans defeated Colombia in four sets. Hide Caption 23 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Real Madrid midfielder Casemiro, left, scores his team's second goal during a preseason match against Roma on Sunday, August 11. Hide Caption 24 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos A horse competes in the annual beach race in Sanlucar de Barrameda, Spain, on Friday, August 9. Hide Caption 25 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Atlanta's Ozzie Albies, left, and Ronald Acuna Jr. do their trademark postgame celebration after winning in Miami on Friday, August 9. Hide Caption 26 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Brazilian swimmers toss a team member into the empty diving pool at the end of the Pan American Games swimming competition on Saturday, August 10. Hide Caption 27 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Aston Villa goalkeeper Tom Heaton makes a save against Tottenham during a Premier League match in London on Saturday, August 10. Hide Caption 28 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Colombian wrestler Jackeline Renteria, right, competes against Puerto Rico's Abnelis Yambo at the Pan American Games on Friday, August 9. Hide Caption 29 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Argentina field-hockey players celebrate after defeating Chile in the semifinals of the Pan American Games on Tuesday, August 6. They went on to win the gold. Hide Caption 30 of 32

Photos: What a shot! 32 amazing sports photos Kansas City catcher Meibrys Viloria tags out Boston's Xander Bogaerts during a Major League Baseball game in Boston on Monday, August 5. Hide Caption 31 of 32
description: Take a look at 32 amazing sports photos from August 4 to 11.
